Article.ArticleTitle: Successful treatment of classic pyoderma gangrenosum with intralesional infliximab injection: A case report.

Abstract.AbstractText: Pyoderma gangrenosum (PG) is a rare dermatological disease characterized by the rapid development of painful skin ulcers. While systemic infliximab is considered a standard treatment for patients with PG, herein, we report our success with the use of intralesional infliximab in a 40-year-old woman with systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) and PG.
